targets.rawSql: SELECT from_unixtime(timestamp - 3600) as date, expected as Prognose, min as Prognose_min, max as Prognose_max FROM pv.prognose_live

targets.expr:
sum(increase(meter{position="grid",type="counter",direction="in",location="$Location"}[1d] offset -1d))/1000 
- sum(increase(meter{position="grid",type="counter",direction="out",location="$Location"}[1d] offset -1d))/1000
+ sum_over_time(
    sum(meter{location="$Location",position="battery",type="gauge"}>0)[1d:5s] offset -1d
)  / 720 / 1000
+ sum_over_time(
    sum(meter{location="$Location",position="battery",type="gauge"}<0)[1d:5s] offset -1d
)  / 720 / 1000
+ sum_over_time(
    sum(meter{location="$Location",position="generator",type="gauge"}>0)[1d:5s] offset -1d
)  / 720 / 1000

-sum(increase((meter{description="Wärmepumpe",location="$Location",position="device",type="counter"} or vector(0))[1d:5s] offset -1d)) / 1000

sum(increase(meter{position="grid",type="counter",direction="in",location="$Location"}[1d] offset -1d))/1000 
- sum(increase(meter{position="grid",type="counter",direction="out",location="$Location"}[1d] offset -1d))/1000
+ sum_over_time(
    sum(meter{location="$Location",position="battery",type="gauge"}>0)[1d:5s] offset -1d
)  / 720 / 1000
+ sum_over_time(
    sum(meter{location="$Location",position="battery",type="gauge"}<0)[1d:5s] offset -1d
)  / 720 / 1000
+ sum_over_time(
    sum(meter{location="$Location",position="generator",type="gauge"}>0)[1d:5s] offset -1d
)  / 720 / 1000

sum(increase(meter{position="grid",type="counter",direction="in",location="$Location"}[1d] offset -1d))/1000 
- sum(increase(meter{position="grid",type="counter",direction="out",location="$Location"}[1d] offset -1d))/1000
+ sum_over_time(
    sum(meter{location="$Location",position="battery",type="gauge"})[1d:5s] offset -1d
)  / 720 / 1000
+ sum_over_time(
    sum(meter{location="$Location",position="generator",type="gauge"}>0)[1d:5s] offset -1d
)  / 720 / 1000
-
sum(increase(meter{position="grid",type="counter",direction="in",location="$Location"}[1d] offset -1d)) / 1000
-
max(
 sum_over_time((
    meter{location="$Location",position="battery",type="gauge"} >0)[1d:5s] offset -1d
 )  / 720 / 1000
)
>=0

sum_over_time(
 (last_over_time(sum((meter{location="$Location",position="grid",type="gauge"}<0) or vector(0))[30s:10s])
 * scalar(last_over_time((sum((tarif {location="$Location",type="bezug"}>0) or vector(0))/100)[30s:10s])))[$__range:5s]
) / 720 /1000

sum_over_time(
 (last_over_time(sum((meter{location="$Location",position="battery",type="gauge"}>0) or vector(0))[30s:10s])
 * scalar(last_over_time((sum((tarif {location="$Location",type="bezug"}>0)/100) or vector(0))[30s:10s])))[$__range:5s]
) / 720 /1000

sum_over_time(
 (last_over_time(sum((meter{location="$Location",position="grid",type="gauge"}<0) or vector(0))[30s:10s]) * -1
 * scalar(last_over_time((sum((tarif {location="$Location",type="einspeisung"}>0)/100) or vector(0))[30s:10s])))[$__range:5s]
) / 720 /1000
